pr_title: Not invoke Exception.printStackTrace() at early VM startup stage

timeline.author: gacholio

replies.bodyText:
Added null check, won't print message for a null cause.
Please have another look.
replies.author: JasonFengJ9

timeline.message:
Early stage System.exit() don't invoke Exception.printStackTrace()

At early stage of VM startup, vm->applicationClassLoader is still NULL
when Exception.printStackTrace() is invoked, hence cause segmentation
error;
Replace it with the exception message & cause.

Signed-off-by: Jason Feng <fengj@ca.ibm.com>
